roadmap: Databases: SQLite Access MongoDb and Neo4j, Translation, SOAP injection, Command line interface
news: [New] Translation system: contribute and translate jSQL for example into Arabic. Click on the top right button and open menu [Community], choose a language using [I help translate jSQL] and translate some text then click on [Send]. The developer will add your translation to the next release
[New] Custom Http method: use your own custom method instead of POST using the top right button
